title: Saudi Arabia : mobile phone internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of mobile phone internet users in millions
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of mobile phone internet users in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
In general Number of mobile phone internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of mobile phone internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum Number of mobile phone internet users in millions, about 22.5 was reported at Year 2023
Minimum Number of mobile phone internet users in millions about 19.6 was reached at Year 2017
